title: MSQI Inter-Visitation: Word Generation Launch, Literacy in Science & Team Meeting
desc: Literacy Across the Content Areas/ Teacher Team ing Word Generation launch, literacy in the science classroom, & data analysis in an interdisciplinary team meeting During this visit participants will see three distinct events. 1. ?Word Generation launch lessons ?2. ?Students using making thinking visible routines to work through a science text 3. ?A team of teacher meeting to analyze data generated through word generation to plan instruction.
